div.p: I hope your school year is off to a wonderful start. We have recently moved here to Dayton from a suburb of Cleveland called Rocky River joining your Horizon High School family.
My 11th grader Cihan who was apprehensive to change schools and start all over, wakes with greater enthusiasm in just a week of school.
I am very satisfied with the performance of school. Horizon helped us a lot on the process of transition to start living in the US. Teachers are very friendly.
